column2: Isma'il the Visionary achieved what had been thought impossible - uniting the Saharan nomads into a single great horde. His Empire spread across much of North Africa, but shattered upon his death. If I could reunite the nomads, perhaps I could equal or exceed his achievements...
Like the mighty Yugoslavia to the south, the Western Slav brothers must unite under one banner and do away with the borders that have long divided us.
Comission a New Stamp of Authority.
Legalists are required to have a stamp of authority in order to rule peacefully.
Study an Era of Chinese law
As a legalist I am expected to study an era of Pre-Event chinese law, Shall I begin my studies?
We can investigate the taxation receipts of a province and determine if it is due a tax rebate.

It is my duty as a Mattaist to follow Father Matta the Poor's example by reducing suffering in the world, therefore I shall spend some of my substantial wealth to help the impoverished people of my lands following on the path Father Matta the Poor laid our for me.

It is my duty as a Zoroastrian to halt the spread of Angra Manyu's influence in the world by reducing suffering, therefore I shall spend some of my substantial wealth to help the impoverished people of my faith in accordance with the mantra of "Good Thoughts, Good Deeds, Good Words".
It is my duty as a Ramadi to do good in the name of Allah by reducing suffering, therefore I shall spend some of my substantial wealth to help the impoverished people of my faith.
It is my duty as a Kev Dab Qhuas to do good in the name of the gods by reducing suffering, therefore I shall spend some of my substantial wealth to help the impoverished people of my faith.
It is my duty as a Sikh to perform seva, therefore I shall spend some of my substantial wealth to help the impoverished.

As a Buddhist it is key to the path of enlightenment to perform the Dana, giving to others without expectation of anything in return. This is best done by helping the poor of a county on a mass scale.
Now that we hold three of our most sacred sites we should establish a centralised church for our faith.
Now that we hold three of our most sacred sites we should establish a centralised church for our faith.

§Y[Root.GetBestName]§! creates §YAustria-Hungary§!\n§YCzechia§!, §YSlovakia§!, §YSlovania§! and §YCroatia§! will become De Jure parts of Austria-Hungary if their De Jure territory is completely controlled by §Y[Root.GetBestName]§!

It is said that once upon a time the lands of the Austrians and the lands of the Hungarians where united as a single Empire, and its Emperor ruled the world. Whether or not these stories are true, there is no denying how useful such a title will be.
Now that we have united the necessary territory we can declare ourselves the Holy Filipino Empire.
Now that we have united the necessary territory we can declare ourselves Jomon.
Now that we have united the necessary territory we can declare ourselves Balhae.

§Y[Root.GetBestName]§! creates §YAustria-Romaia§!\n§YCzechia§!, §YSlovakia§!, §YSlovania§! and §YCroatia§! will become De Jure parts of Austria-Romaia if their De Jure territory is completely controlled by §Y[Root.GetBestName]§!

It is said that once upon a time the lands of the Austrians and the lands of the Hungarians where united as a single Empire, and its Emperor ruled the world. However, since now Hungary doesn't exist, we'll have to make do with what we have on our hands now.

§Y[Root.GetBestName]§! creates §YHungary-Austria§!\n§YCzechia§!, §YSlovakia§!, §YSlovania§! and §YCroatia§! will become De Jure parts of Austria-Hungary if their De Jure territory is completely controlled by §Y[Root.GetBestName]§!

It is said that once upon a time the lands of the Hungarians and the lands of the Austrians where united as a single Empire, and its Emperor ruled the world. Whether or not these stories are true, there is no denying how useful such a title will be.
I can pay a significant sum to commission a blacksmith to produce a mechanical prosthesis of a hand made from gold.
I can pay a significant sum to commission a blacksmith to produce a mechanical prosthesis of a hand made from iron.
I can pay a significant sum to commission a gunsmith to produce a shotgun which will attach to my stump.
I can pay a significant sum to commission a blacksmith to produce a simple prosthesis of a leg.
I shall claim the throne of poland, as is my birthright.
Sisu is respected by the priests. It can be spent for various favours within the temples. Like Prestige, it is added to your score on the death of your ruler.
As a member of the Sisukkuus faith I can choose to emulate one of several figures vital to our faith.
This character will sit in Ylijumala's realm in the afterlife.
Claim Your Place in God's Domain
It is incredibly difficult to achieve good sisu in one's lifetime, but if achieved I will live on forever in Ylijumala's realm when I die.

In the ancient antediluvian times Lenin was struck down by Stalin and Trotsky. The Holy Spirit threatened Stalin with Lenin's eventual reincarnation centuries later, I believe that I may be that reincarnation. If I am then I could lead my people against the Stalinists.
I can donate to the clergymen of my faith so that they can improve the church in various aspects.
It is said that once upon a time Lusitania was a Great Power, controlling large areas of Iberia without the Spanish threat. Now is the time for us to proclaim our greatness once more!

While Jews don't proselytize people to turn to Judaism, preferring that people convert on their own, they do preach people to follow the seven rules of Noah. I can convince them to become a Noahide and secure themselves a place in the world to come.
It is said that once upon a time Spain ruled the majority of Iberia. Now is the time for us to restore the great empire once more!
The Shinsengumi has become independent of us, but with the right application of money and prestige we could reclaim them.
The feared Shinsengumi was the loyal guard of the Shogun before the Event. Reforming them would give your seat additional safety.
Once in ancient times the kingdom of Hungary stretched across the entire Pannonian basin, if we can reclaim it once again perhaps re could re-establish the old boundaries.
A long time ago, a prosperous Chinese empire ruled these wild lands. As we have proven our resilience here, it is now time for us to declare the Tang Dynasty once more!
A long time ago, a prosperous Chinese empire ruled these wild lands. As we have proven our resilience here, it is now time for us to declare the Jin Dynasty once more!
A long time ago, combined forces of evil destroyed the one true Kingdom of Heaven. As we have proven our resilience and conviction, it is now time for us to declare the Heavenly Kingdom once more!
A long time ago, the Crown of Aragon dominated the Mediterranean. As we have proven our resilience and power in this region, it is now time for us to declare Aragon once more!

Some of my vassals are beginning to suspect my reign has lasted too long. While they are not yet fully convinced of my Immortality, they are suspicious and will likely make trouble if they remain in power.
column3: Certains de mes vassaux commencent à avoir le sentiment que mon règne a duré trop longtemps. Bien qu'ils ne soient pas totalement certains de mon immortalité, ils sont suspicieux, et causeront probablement des ennuis s'ils restent au pouvoir.
column4: Manche Eurer Vasallen hegen den Verdacht, dass Eure Herrschaft zu lang anhält. Sie sind noch nicht ganz von meiner Unsterblichkeit überzeugt, aber sie hegen Verdacht und werden vermutlich Schwierigkeiten bereiten, wenn sie an der Macht bleiben.
column6: Algunos de tus vasallos empiezan a sospechar que mi reinado ha durado demasiado. Aunque aún no están convencidos del todo de mi inmortalidad, abrigan sospechas y es probable que causen problemas si se mantienen en el poder.

column2: The suspicious vassals are now certain there is something unnatural about me, and are certainly plotting my demise. They must be stamped out, root and branch.
column3: Les vassaux suspicieux sont à présent certains qu'il y a quelque chose d'anormal à propos de moi, et sont certainement en train de comploter pour que ce soit ma fin. Ils doivent être totalement éliminés.
column4: Die verdächtigen Vasallen sind sich jetzt sicher, dass ich etwas Unnatürliches an mir habe und hecken Pläne für meinen Untergang. Sie müssen mit Stumpf und Stiel ausgerottet werden.
column6: Ahora los vasallos sospechosos tienen la certeza de que hay algo antinatural en mí, y seguramente estén urdiendo mi muerte. Hay que arrancar la mala hierba. De raíz.

column2: A long time ago, the peoples of the South Caucasus unified to form Transcaucasia. But their attempts were in vain, as it collapsed as quickly as it was formed. Now that we have proven our unity and power in this region, it is now time for us to declare Transcaucasia once more!
Now that our people have migrated to Iran and secured a mighty kingdom it is time to declare our new homeland Soitoskanistan.

A long time ago, a distant group of "Lusophones" came to India and created a prosperous empire. Although their empire is long gone, their legacy still stood the test of time. Now that we have proven our power in this region, it is now time for us to declare the Konkani Empire once more!

A long time ago, the ancient Swedes dominated this region, fighting off multiple coalitions wanting its splendor. Although that empire is long gone, their legacy still stood the test of time. Now that we have proven our power in this region, it is now time for us to declare the Swedish Empire once more!

A long time ago, the ancient Bulgarians dominated this region, even defeating the formidable Romans. Although that empire is long gone, their legacy still stood the test of time. Now that we have gained independence from Yugoslavia, it is now time for us to declare the Bulgarian Empire once more!

A long time ago, the Great Yuan ruled the world from Khanbaliq. Led by Genghis, the Empire brought never before seen prosperity. Soon after his death, civil war erupted, and dynastic bickering brought the empire down. Although that empire is long gone, our dynasty has reached grandeur, and thus it is now time for us to declare the Yuan Empire once more!

A long time ago, the ancient Manchurian people ruled a vast empire. Led by the legendary Hong Taiji , the Qing Empire brought never before seen prosperity. Although that empire is long gone, our dynasty has achieved immense success in our conquests, and thus it is now time for us to declare the Qing Empire once more!
Our dynasty has achieved immense success in our conquest of China, perhaps it is now time for us to declare a proper empire!

A long time ago, there was a vast and wealthy empire located in these lands. Led by the legendary peasant leader who overthrew the trecherous Yuan , the Ming Empire brought never before seen prosperity. Although that empire is long gone, our dynasty has achieved immense success in our conquests, and thus it is now time for us to declare the Ming Empire once more!
As we have conquered more areas in China, we have now firmly established ourselves here. By proclaiming a new Christian Chinese dynasty, we can bring God's light to this forsaken land!
Form the Dong Duong Thien Quoc
As we have conquered great tracts of land, we have now firmly established ourselves here. By proclaiming the Dong Duong Thien Quoc we accounce ourselves as a powerful empire in this region.

A long time ago, the ancient peoples of the Baltic united to stand against the invading Russians. Although that empire is long gone, we now have control over the region, and thus it is now time for us to declare the Baltic Union once more!

A long time ago, the ancient peoples of the North Sea attempted to united under a single banner. Although that idea had been abandoned for ages, we now have control over the region, and thus it is the perfect time to make the Northern Union idea come true!

A long time ago, the Persian region were dominated by our ancestors. Although that empire is long gone, we now have control over the region, and thus it is the perfect time to declare the Ilkhanate once more!

A long time ago, the Central Asian Steppes were dominated by our ancestors. Although that empire is long gone, we now have control over the region, and thus it is the perfect time to declare the Chagatai Khanate once more!

A long time ago, the Western Steppes were dominated by our ancestors. Although that empire is long gone, we now have control over the region, and thus it is the perfect time to declare the Golden Horde once more!

A long time ago, the Western Steppes were dominated by our ancestors. Although that empire is long gone, we now have control over the region, and thus it is the perfect time to declare Scythia once more!

A long time ago, our forefathers ruled this land with great prosperity. Although that republic is long gone, we now have asserted our dominance and wealth over the region, and thus it is the perfect time to declare the United Arab Emirates once more!

Being constantly surrounded by enemies on all sides, we have fought countless wars to maintain our unique domain. Although the Ovlatii had a unifying leader in the past, those days were long gone. However, in the midst of these conflicts, we have now attained control over our home region, and now we can proudly proclaim a Kagan once more!

A long time ago, the mythical Angevin people united England and France against all odds. Although those days are long gone, we have now attained control over the same areas, and can proudly proclaim the Angevin Empire once more!
As a follower of the Pancasila faith, it is within my divine duty to follow the Five Principles as they were given to us by the Prophet.

A long time ago, our family ruled France in addition to Spain. An attempt at uniting the two realms was made, however, otherworldly forces converged upon our dynasty. These evil spirits contested our efforts! Our French relatives were slain mercilessly by Madame Guillotine and her Révolutionnaires, and our domains were forced to be split for all of eternity. The Spanish branch of the family barely survived the catastrophe, relying only on sheer luck and making a daring escape from the chaos. Those days have long past us, and now more than ever, we have proven our dominance in both regions, and thus can proudly proclaim the Bourbon Union!

The Empire of Mali was once the richest empire in history. That much is known to us, and countless rulers have attempted to emulate their success. But with the blessings of the Greatest, we are now in that position, and thus it is time to declare the Malian Empire once more!

A long time ago, our ancestors, the famed Ghurids, dominated our nearby regions. Their empire stretched from Iran to Bengal, and brought glory to our people. Since we now have control over those same lands, it is time to establish the Ghurid Empire once more!
As we have grown our domain, we can no longer be subject to our neighbours. To truly show our independence and might, we shall declare the Kingdom of South Sudan!
As we have solidified our rule in these foreign lands, it seems that we will be here to stay for the long term. Because of this, we shall declare the Empire of Shinnihon!

As we have spread the news of Constantine's return, more and more people are eagerly awaiting their savior. In addition, we have proven our might and conviction against all odds, and with that, perhaps it is time to proclaim myself as Constantine incarnate!

As our trade and influence grew, Mallorca is now a hub rivaling Barcelona. In addition, with our republican policies constantly being rejected by the monarchy in the mainland, perhaps it is time for us to declare our own island republic!

As our trade and fortunes grew, Åland is now a thriving port. With such prosperity, our people feel more emboldened and no longer subservient to Sweden or Finland. Maybe it is time for us to declare our own island republic and forge our own destiny!

Once upon a time, Singapore had enormous riches and was the envy of the world. In the aftermath of the Event, the city's prestige had fallen and our people thus suffered. Now however, with our newfound glory, it is time for us to declare the glorious Republic of Singapore once more!

Sri Vijaya was once a powerful maritime empire, with recognition from Empire as far as Ganges and Peking. However, those days has been ended long before our time, as the tide of destruction washed all our creation. But now that we has arisen, it is time for us brave heir of Sri Vijaya to rebuild it all again!

As our trade and fortunes grew, Danzig is now a thriving port. With such prosperity, our people feel more emboldened and no longer subservient to Brandenburg or Poland. Maybe it is time for us to declare a new nation and forge our own destiny!

Arabia is a large region, perhaps even a continent. A full conquest of the area would take a long period, and perhaps might cause more trouble than it is worth. Instead, why not focus on the home region? After all, our area is far more prosperous than the chaotic north. Maybe it is time to do something different...

Nigerian history was rife with religious conflict. In the end, the Yoruba "cult" prevailed. But with the blessings of God, we have now managed to create a new Episcopal domain. Perhaps it is time to ask the Primate of Lagos for his blessing...
Choose one of the three major Sufi schools to adhere to.

After breaking free from Yugoslavia, the Albanian people have vowed to never to be subjugated again. To counteract future foreign incursions, the Albanian Kingdom has expanded greatly, more so than ever before. To truly solidify our message of independence, perhaps it is time to declare the Empire of Iliria and let the world be envious of our glory!

After the Kali-Yuga, the Burmeese has been subjected to many humitilation from their former subjects. But now a warlord arose among us and the Burmeese Kingdom has regained control of Irriwaddy heartland. To truly solidify our authority, we must proclaim the restoration of Burmeese Empire!

After the Kali-Yuga, the Burmeese has been subjected to many humitilation from their former subjects. But now Buddha heard our call and decided to send me, a warrior-deva to be our savior. With Irrawaddy heartland recovered, it wouldn't be a stretch to says that I have proven to be worthy of such title!
Ancient Aquileia was once a glorious state that ruled this region. Perhaps with our recent successes, we should revive such splendor?

As we have conquered and settled in this region, our lifestyles have also adapted to this new environment. With our strong political hold on in northern Italy, perhaps it is time to establish a new kingdom of our own?

As we have fought back against our heathen neighbours, we have gained new territory that encompasses the entirety of Bengal. Perhaps it is time to establish a new empire of our own to cement our claim forever!
As we have fought and conquered new lands, our domain has now risen to new heights. Perhaps it is time to establish a new empire of our own to cement our claim forever!
A long time ago, our ancestors created a vast and prosperous Islamic empire. With all of these lands under our control, it is time for us to proclaim the Mamluks once more!
A long time ago, our ancestors created a vast and prosperous empire. With all of these lands under our control, it is time for us to proclaim Cumania once more!

Having been forced to make this foreign land home, we the exiled Viet loyalists of Prince Nguyen have carved out a domain of our own. Perhaps it's time to create a new empire to challenge those traitors back home!

Our peoples, subservient to surrounding realms for a millenia, finally rallied behind Great Lord of our own. Now our realms surpassed decadent brethen down south, maybe It's time to take our chances and declare new Kingdom!

Centuries ago, our peoples have formed a union with others who stood against Burmeese. That Union has been struck down when Minye Swe won the battle of Toungoo. But it was our lineage that took chance amidst the chaos and restored the union, now with Burmar proper in our realm. It is time to set aside our differences and integrated them into our union!

Before the Siamese struck, Cambodia withstood the calamity and prospered under the wise rule of the crown and angkar. With one gone and another in shamble, we still managed to rise back againsts the viet and thai. Now with vast swathes of land in our hand, its a time for us to take charge in the region one more!
A long time ago, our ancestors ruled over a vast and prosperous empire. With all of these lands under our control, it is time for us to proclaim Laotian Empire once more!
As we have created a vast domain on this side of the Caucasus Mountains, perhaps it's time to consolidate our realm and proclaim a new empire!

For centuries, certain Buddhist prophecies have foretold the arising of a great King whose great army will vanquish the forces of Darkness and usher in a worldwide Golden Age. If I controlled enough land, I might be able to claim to be this Great King.
Proclaim the restoration of the ancient names and titles upon the Archenland Peninsula and declare myself to be the new Emperor of Archenland!

It is said that once upon a time Prussia was a Great German Kingdom in the east, controlling much of the Baltic Coast. Thus far all attempts to recreate have been only met with failure and international embarrassment. But perhaps a sufficiently powerful Prussian could finally restore the rightful lands of Prussia?
The Legends speak of the times long lost where the all the Slavic people stood united under the mighty Great Russia. Perhaps a great enough ruler can bring these times back.

The Legends speak of the times long lost, where the all the Slavic people stood united under the mighty Soyuz and its great ruler [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]. Perhaps a great enough ruler can bring these times back.

The great legendary Hero Temujin was, at the height of his power betrayed and cast to the Red Menace. Although his loyal followers failed at ever finding him and freeing him from his prison, perhaps a great ruler can instead restore his legacy.
With enough digging we are sure to find proof of perfidy amongst even the most upright subjects.
Traitors are everywhere! With enough digging we are sure to find proof of the perfidy of even the most apparently-loyal subject.

In ancient days, the people of India accepted the overlordship of The Queen, and this land was so bountiful that it was graced to be called the Jewel in Her Majesty's Crown. With our conquests of the most crucial cities of India, we can truly claim to be the successors to that great realm.
Legends tell of ancient times when all of Europe stood united as one. Perhaps a significantly powerful ruler may bring those times back?.
§Y[Root.GetBestName]§! restores §Ythe European Union§! Incorporate held European Kingdoms into the Union.

The Bhagavanist faith has never had a proper holy order dedicated solely to fighting the heretic. If I were powerful enough, I might be able to create such an order, bringing all of the faithful's most zealous warriors together under one banner.
Long ago, all Indians were united under a single Hindu Rashtra. If I become powerful enough, I could recreate that great Empire, creating great Bharat again!
Our ancestors once used to dominate these lands. It is time to return to the way they should be.
Our ancestors once used to dominate these lands. It is time to return to the way they should be.
As the ruler of Laconia you have the right to vassalize the mercenary company based on the legendary Laconians who fought for their freedom in ancient times.
Form the High Kingdom of Czechoslovakia
Form the High Kingdom of Czechoslovakia
Form the High Kingdom of Saudi Arabia
Form the High Kingdom of Saudi Arabia
§Y[Root.GetBestName]§! creates §YThe High Kingdom of Saudi Arabia§!.

In the Antediluvian age, before the rise of thelema and the Brittanics, the Anglophone people of the British Isles once ruled a mighty and feared kingdom known as England. If we were to become powerful enough perhaps we could restore it?
For centuries Macedonia has been torn between warring states. Now with all core lands of Macedonia under my rule, I could be able to reunify those lands into the Macedonia of old.
Construct a mighty war chariot, so that your riders will respect your might.
The Kingdom of Gondor was cruelly destroyed by the British invaders. Now that we have retaken Paris, we can reform this great kingdom and begin the reconquest of our native home!

The Kingdom of Arnor was lost by the decadence of the Bonaparte family in centuries past, even before the British invaded. Now that we have retaken Marseille, we can truly call ourselves Kings of Arnor once more.

The Kingdom of Harad, although described briefly in the Novel, was never a part of Númenor other than one of the many titles of the High King. Now that we have taken the lands we believe to be Harad we can finally crown ourselves their legitimate King!
Restore the Eastern Lands of the White Tree

Mighty Númenor once stretched from the Pyrenees to the Polders of Holland. That great Empire spread the Novelist faith throughout the land, but the wicked British utterly destroyed it. Now that we have reclaimed much of our ancient glory, we can once again lay claim to the lands of Enedwaith in the Benelux!
Proclaim the restoration of the ancient names and titles upon the Nilfgaardian Peninsula and declare myself to be the new Emperor of Nilfgaard.
Integrate the Kingdom of Babylon into the Empire of Assyria.
Integrate the Kingdom of Aramea into the Empire of Assyria.
Integrate the Kingdom of Assyria into the Empire of Assyria.
Integrate the Kingdom of Babylon into the Empire of Babylon.
Integrate the Kingdom of Aramea into the Empire of Babylon.
Integrate the Kingdom of Assyria into the Empire of Babylon.
Through great talent and expense the emperor of Bhutan can reorganise the Bhutanese bureaucracy to absorb new regions into its sphere of governance.
Through great talent and expense the emperor of Bhutan can reorganise the Bhutanese bureaucracy to absorb new regions into its sphere of governance.
Through great talent and expense the emperor of Bhutan can reorganise the Bhutanese bureaucracy to absorb new regions into its sphere of governance.
Through great talent and expense the emperor of Bhutan can reorganise the Bhutanese bureaucracy to absorb new regions into its sphere of governance.
Through great talent and expense the emperor of Bhutan can reorganise the Bhutanese bureaucracy to absorb new regions into its sphere of governance.
Through great talent and expense the emperor of Bhutan can reorganise the Bhutanese bureaucracy to absorb new regions into its sphere of governance.
Through great talent and expense the emperor of Bhutan can reorganise the Bhutanese bureaucracy to absorb new regions into its sphere of governance.
Through great talent and expense the emperor of Bhutan can reorganise the Bhutanese bureaucracy to absorb new regions into its sphere of governance.
Through great talent and expense the emperor of Bhutan can reorganise the Bhutanese bureaucracy to absorb new regions into its sphere of governance.
For centuries Assyria has been torn between warring states. Now with all core lands of Assyria under the rule of a true Assyrian, I could be able to reunify those lands into the Assyria of old.
For centuries Assyria has been torn between warring states. Now with all core lands of Assyria under the rule of a true Assyrian, I could be able to reunify those lands into the Assyria of old.
Once in ancient times armenia stretched from the Mediterranean to the Caspian and now it does so once again, so let us take up the mantle of our forebears.
For centuries Aramea has been torn between warring states. Now with all core lands of Aramea under the rule of a true Aramaic, I could be able to reunify those lands into the Aramea of old.

Even after the Churches of the East have confederated under the Patriarch of the East, we were still a minor and weak player in the middle east. No more, now that we have consolidated our rule over Lebanon and Syria, it is time to form an empire in the name of the Syriac-Chaldean Church.
Before being sidelined and weakened, our ancestors have ruled much of this land as part of Bolgharia, now that we are again powerful we can restore this ancient title.
Now that we have a tangible foothold beyond the seas, we can proclaim our dominion to be a part of Brazil, New Brazil.
Our people once ruled vast lands around Mesopotamia and Syria, but since then have declined. Now, finally we are able to restore the glory that once upon a time, belonged to us.

For centuries Mesopotamia has been torn between warring states. Now with all core lands of Babylon under the rule of a true Mesopotamian, I could be able to reunify those lands into the Babylon of old.
With our Babylonian culture reborn and our freedom won from the Assyrians, perhaps it is time for us to form an empire of our own.
Long ago a people just like us ruled this land, they too called Hellas their homeland. While they may not be our ancestors, we can claim their title by right of kinship.
Long ago a people just like us ruled this land, they too called Hellas their homeland. While they may not be our ancestors, we can claim their title by right of kinship.
For centuries our people have struggled to survive on the steppe but if we were to unite all of the lands near to our homeland we could perhaps finally exist in peace.
In the antediluvian age our ancestors were spread out across this land in a great and mighty organisation. Now that we are powerful ourselves perhaps it is time to reclaim this old title.
Before the event, our ancestors were the hegemons of all Europe, now that we have recovered our strength, we can restore the Europabund and our hegemony over Europe.
Now that the servants of the Pope have been banished from Germany, we can proclaim a kingdom of Luther, the Lutherstaat.
Now that I'm the undisputed master of the Temiri steppes, I can proclaim myself the ruler of a united realm.
Now that our people control the lands of Ethiopia, we can revive the council of Monks, or Nezirim, headed by a prophet, or Navee and lead our people to greatness!
As a powerful Celtic ruler, I can draw on ancient Irish mythology to forge a new empire, the land of the young, or Tír na nÓg
While I'm a powerful Pirate King, every King needs a kingdom, time to form an empire that will dominate the seven seas!(Requires 2 kingdoms to form)
We shall collect the core lands of this ancient empire, and raise the ancient banners of the Latin Empire.
Become the Emperor of the §YLatin Empire§!
I will gather the crown lands of Byzantium, and raise the old banners of Rome once more.
Become the Emperor of the §YByzantine Empire§!
I will gather the crown lands of the Ottomans, and raise the old banners of Osman once more.
Become the Osman of the §YOttoman Empire§!
Now that we have risen to a place of great prominence as a people we shall declare a great empire to rival that of Rome!
Now that we rule great stretches of land it is only right and just for our people to have a kingdom to call our own.
Now that I have united the homelands of my people let us establish our own Principality.
Form the Governate of the North Sea
Now that we rule all of the Feroes perhaps it is right that we stretch Brwtysh influence across the north sea?
§Y[Root.GetBestName]§! creates §YThe Governate of the North Sea§!.
Our Order has grown so far and wide it makes sense that we require a reorganisation of our system to handle all of our holdings.
Our Order has grown so far and wide it makes sense that we require a reorganisation of our system to handle all of our holdings.
Our Order has grown so far and wide it makes sense that we require a reorganisation of our system to handle all of our holdings.
Our Order has grown so far and wide it makes sense that we require a reorganisation of our system to handle all of our holdings.
Our Order has grown so far and wide it makes sense that we require a reorganisation of our system to handle all of our holdings.
The KGB was historicaly a subject of the [e_cccp.GetName]. It is time for it to continue serving its rightful ruler.
In the ancient past our people were part of a great empire that spanned the known world, If we were to control key regions of this ancient antediluvian empire we could claim its mantle.
Form the most Serene Republic of Venice
Once in the distant past our people held a great republic in this land, as the inheritors of that tradition we hold the right to just as much grandeur.
§Y[Root.GetBestName]§! creates §YThe most Serene Republic of Venice§!.
Once in the distant past our people held a great republic in this land, as the inheritors of that tradition we hold the right to just as much grandeur.
Once in the distant past our people held a great republic in this land, as the inheritors of that tradition we hold the right to just as much grandeur.
Once in the distant past our people held a great republic in this land, as the inheritors of that tradition we hold the right to just as much grandeur.
Once in the distant past our people held a great republic in this land, as the inheritors of that tradition we hold the right to just as much grandeur.
Once in the distant past our people held a great republic in this land, as the inheritors of that tradition we hold the right to just as much grandeur.
Once in the distant past our people held a great republic in this land, as the inheritors of that tradition we hold the right to just as much grandeur.
We shall claim the mantle of the mythological Atlantians and spread our glory across the world!

column3: Créer les Champions de l'Olympe
column4: Champion des Olymp gründen
column6: Crear los Campeones olímpicos

column2: The Sailors of Poseidon train hard and maintain an expert navy, not only for the purpose of battle, but for games of sport  participating is prestigious, and the most skillful of their community are adored by everyone, commoner and noble alike.
column3: Les Champions de l'Olympe s'entraînent dur et maintiennent un physique d'expert, non seulement pour la bataille, mais aussi pour les jeux de sport  la participation est prestigieuse et les plus habiles de leur communauté sont adorés par tout le monde, les roturiers comme les nobles.
column4: Die Champion des Olymp trainieren hart und halten einen starken Körperbau aufrecht. Nicht nur zum Zweck des Kampes, sondern auch für sportliche Wettkämpfe. Die Teilnahme ist prestigeträchtig und die Fähigsten werden sowohl von Bürgern als auch Adligen gleichermaßen verehrt.
column6: Los Campeones olímpicos entrenan duro y mantienen un físico experto no solo para la batalla, sino también para competiciones deportivas. Participar otorga prestigio y los más diestros de la comunidad reciben la adoración de todo el mundo, tanto nobles como plebeyos.

column2: Establish the §YWarrior Society§! of the §YSailors of Poseidon§!
column3: Établir la §Ysociété guerrière§! des §YChampions de l'Olympe§!
column4: Gründet die §YKriegergesellschaft§! der §YChampion des Olymp§!
column6: Fundar la §YSociedad de guerreros§! de los §YCampeones olímpicos§!

column2: We shall unite these lands into a kingdom for the Rhaetian people, Rhaetia.
We shall unite these lands into a kingdom for the Istromanian people, Istromania.
We shall unite our people into a great kingdom, Normandy.
We shall unite our people into a great kingdom, Burgundy.
We shall unite our people into a great kingdom, Provance.
Form the most Serene Republic of Genoa
Once in the distant past our people held a great republic in this land, as the inheritors of that tradition we hold the right to just as much grandeur.
§Y[Root.GetBestName]§! creates §YThe most Serene Republic of Genoa§!.
Grand Ruthenia was once united, but laid waste under the dire Transnistrians. Now that their shackles are no longer binding us, we need to reclaim our destiny!

Long ago in the antediluvian age there was a great empire that united all of central Europe and northern Italy. If we were to somehow reunite this vast territory we could reclaim this mantle for ourselves.

Tsion is the concept of Israel at its height, with internal turmoil rocking the Kingdom for the last 150 years, many clamour for the restoration of the "golden era" of the Jewish people. Now that we have taken control of the territories of Israel at its peak, we are in prime position to fulfill the concept of Tsion and firmly put ourselves on the world stage as a power to be reckoned with.
With the holysites secured, we can re-establish Gongheguo.
With the realm stabilized and the isles captured, we can establish Nusantara.
With the realm stabilized and the isles captured, we can establish Indonesia.
With the realm stabilized, we can establish the Zhou Empire.
With the realm stabilized, we can establish the Song Empire.
With the realm stabilized, we can establish the Xin Empire.
With the realm stabilized, we can establish Minguo.
With the realm stabilized, we can establish the Zheng Empire.
With the realm stabilized, we can establish the Wu Empire.
With the realm stabilized, we can establish the Taiping Heavenly Kingdom.
If I were to become wealthy and prestigious enough I could declare myself to be the Prince of Ulm.
If I were to become wealthy and prestigious enough I could declare myself to be the inheritor of the ancient antediluvian kingdom of Franconia.

The Realm of Dacia was once a Province of The Roman Empire at its height. As we are the inheritors of their legacy and the descendants of the Daco-Romans we can reclaim that glory with enough power and influence.
Our League has grown big enough to encompass the entire Aegean, we should expand and have an appropriate title for that.
Donate money to the Legion of Mary in exchange for Piety and lifelong respect from the [Root.Religion.GetName] Church.
Donate 300¤ to the Legion of Mary
Donate money to the Knights of St Lazarus in exchange for Piety and lifelong respect from the [Root.Religion.GetName] Church.
Donate 300¤ to the Knights of St Lazarus
Donate money to the Columbus Knights in exchange for Piety and lifelong respect from the [Root.Religion.GetName] Church.
Donate money to the Carmalites in exchange for Piety and lifelong respect from the [Root.Religion.GetName] Church.
I can drive the Legion of Mary from my realm and seize their castles. However, it is a very impious thing to do...
Expelled the Knights of St Lazarus
Expel the Knights of St Lazarus
I can drive the Knights of St Lazarus from my realm and seize their castles. However, it is a very impious thing to do...
I can drive the Order of Montesa from my realm and seize their castles. However, it is a very impious thing to do...
Donate money to the Order of Montesa in exchange for Piety and lifelong respect from the [Root.Religion.GetName] Church.
Donate 300¤ to the Order of Montesa.

Founding a Oligarchic Republic will convert all my Tribal Holdings into Cities. Where this occurs - if the County is big enough - Castle and Temple Holdings will also be created if they do not already exist. Your vassals are likely to follow suit if they are of your religion and culture.

Founding a Oligarchic Republic will convert all my Tribal Holdings into Cities. Where this occurs - if the County is big enough - Castle and Temple Holdings will also be created if they do not already exist. Your vassals are likely to follow suit if they are of your religion and culture.

column3: Expulser [Root.GetReligionsOneHolyOrder]
column4: Vertreibt [Root.GetReligionsOneHolyOrder]
column6: Expulsar [Root.GetReligionsOneHolyOrder]

column2: I can drive [Root.GetReligionsOneHolyOrder] from my realm and seize their castles. However, it is a very impious thing to do...
column3: Je peux expulser [Root.GetReligionsOneHolyOrder] de mon pays et m'emparer de leurs commanderies. Ce serait par contre un acte des plus impies...
column4: Ich kann [Root.GetReligionsOneHolyOrder] aus meinem Reich vertreiben und ihre Burgen beschlagnahmen. Allerdings wäre das leider nicht sehr fromm ...
column6: Puedo manejar [Root.GetReligionsOneHolyOrder] de mi reino y arrebatarles sus castillos. No obstante, eso sería una acción muy impía...

column3: Donner 300¤ à [Root.GetReligionsOneHolyOrder]
column4: Spende [Root.GetReligionsOneHolyOrder] 300¤
column6: Donar 300¤ [Root.GetReligionsOneHolyOrder]

column2: Donate money to [Root.GetReligionsOneHolyOrder] in exchange for Piety and lifelong respect from the [Root.Religion.GetName] Church.
column3: Il est possible de donner de l'argent à [Root.GetReligionsOneHolyOrder] en échange de piété. Cet acte augmentera également le respect de l'Église [Root.Religion.GetName] envers vous.
column4: Ich kann [Root.GetReligionsOneHolyOrder] Geld spenden und erhalte dafür Pietät und den lebenslangen Respekt der [Root.Religion.GetName]e Kirche.
column6: Puedo hacer una donación a [Root.GetReligionsOneHolyOrder]. A cambio obtendré la Piedad y el respeto de por vida de la Iglesia [Root.Religion.GetName].

column6: Expulsar [Root.GetReligionsTwoHolyOrder]

column2: Didn't try to construct castle in the last year.
[Root.Holder.GetTitledFirstName] didn't refuse castle construction in the last ten years.
Isn't expelled from the realm of [Root.Holder.GetTitledFirstName]
As the [From.GetTitle] of [From.PrimaryTitle.GetName], you can request to construct a castle in the realms of [From.Religion.GetName] lords.

column3: Converted
column4: Converted
column6: Converted

column2: Re-enter communion with the Catholic Church
In the ancient past several of our constituent churches were in communion with the Pope in Rome. Perhaps it is time we returned to his flock.
The Fifth Veda tells legends about many artifacts. A pious Neovedic ruler can begin the search for them anytime, if they don't already have one.

Ever since the fall of our cousins House Belgium-Oranje-Nassau-Weilburg to Novelism during the fall of the Beneluxian empire we of the house Oranje-Nassau have been the only branch left Christian. The last member of our dynasty during the fall was a member of the Knights Hospitaller. As he is now grandmaster if we were to reclaim the Netherlands for Calvinism the order would easily accept the grandmaster abdicating to become the king of the Netherlands and would serve him as they did in the antediluvian age.

After laborious study of the Mikrah, Talmud and Zohar, and gathering the approval of religious authorities. I can finally proclaim myself the Mashiach ben Yosef, the true Messiah of the Jewish people.
With enough gold and persuasion, I can buy a prized relic from this person
With enough gold and persuasion, I can buy a prized relic from this person
Choose a past inspiration from Jewish history
Fetishes are said to house spirits within them and thus have supernatural powers, maybe I can acquire one for myself.
Choose a denomination of the Anglican faith.
Choose a denomination of the Episcopal faith.
Choose a Church to join out of the main churches in the mainline union of churches.
Choose one of the sects of Ma'aravi Judaism to identify with.
Choose a branch of the Vagarna faith
Syncretism is a core aspect of Vagarna, and thus I am able to syncretize and sympathize with another faith.
You can choose to study an aspect of American philosophy that will affect your governance for the next few years.
Choose another faith to sympathize with.
It is a fact of our existence that we have to co-exist with other faiths, but with the Thelemics and Anglicans being so opposed to each other, we have to decide who to sympathize with.
Choose a Zarist cult to join.
Choose one of the two Nupolona-kolon ways.
Choose a set of deities to emphasize out of the Four Guardians Pantheon.

Unlike the Sunnis, us Shiites have rejected the notion of one man heading the entirety of the faith. That said, respected Imams still hold vast influence over great swaths of our realm. Thus, we can form a council of the most powerful and respected Imams to streamline the Shiite faith.
Join one of the major Hasidic sects prevalent across the United States.
Choose a past inspiration from Jewish history
You may play with the fabric of time and launch a Jacobinist Revolution somewhere in the world.
Has at least 4 counties in a kingdom, which he holds or doesn't have a holder.
A pious and prestigious emperor with a litle gift could convince the Ecclesiarch to swear fealty to them.
A pious and prestigious emperor with a litle gift could convince the Pope to swear fealty to them.

The Sevillian religion's core is in the Iberian Peninsula, therefore the emperor of Spain can have a huge influence in religious matters too. A pious emperor with a litle gift could convince the pope to swear fealty to them.
I can borrow 300¤ from Arhavi Merchants and moneylenders living in the local ports that have come from the far off land of Amr-ika.
I will repay the gold that I owe the Arhavi moneylenders.
I can hire a gunsmith to produce a quality firearm for me to use in battle.
I can hire a gunsmith from the Kybur pass to produce a firearm for me to use in battle.
I can hire a gunsmith to produce a firearm for me to use in battle.
I will follow in the steps of the great Hooded Robin and Arsène the Lupin and fight back against the corrupt and evil through daring acts of theft.

Tiger hunting is a noble sport but also an occasion to meet your vassals to forge bonds of friendship and discuss important business. Though believed to not be native, tigers appeared in Europe after the event.
I shall use my great antediluvian knowledge to create wonderous ancient medicine.
In Bhutan as a member of the aristocracy you are expected to take an exam to be qualified as a Bureaucrat.
Subsume a Kashin into the Shogunate
Subsume a Kashin into the Shogunate
Subsume a Kashin into the Pretender Shogunate
Subsume a Kashin into the Pretender Shogunate
Return the Emperor to Shogunate control
I shall Return the Emperor to Shogunate control.
I am a Powerful and prestigious lord I shall challenge the role of the Shogun.
Now that I have destroyed the Shogunate I may claim its mantle.
I will submit as a Kashin to the Shogun.
I will submit as a Kashin to the Pretender Shogun.
My religion believes that It is possible to burn away the sins of the body.
As the Emperor of the Thunder Dragon Empire I will provide large scale financial support to my friends and allies outside of Bhutan.
As the Emperor of the Thunder Dragon Empire I will provide military support by sending a detachment of the Imperial army to my friends and allies outside of Bhutan.
As a friend of the Emperor of the Thunder Dragon Empire I will request large scale financial support.
As a friend of the Emperor of the Thunder Dragon Empire I will request military support consisting of a detachment of the Imperial army.
A young nobleman who has caught your eye makes his début at a formal ball.
Study to become a Gaon of the Torah and reach unparalleled levels of respect and prestige in Judaism.
Study to become a Gaon of the Torah and reach unparalleled levels of respect and prestige in Judaism.
Study to become a Gaon of the Torah!
Perhaps we can try and emulate the administration of the ancient Constantines?
§Y[Root.GetBestName]§! adopts the Byzantine style of succession and the §YImperial§! government. The vassals will like this.
This child needs to be shown the light of your chosen sect of Quranism.
Quranism is not a uniform religion, it has many sects, and now it's time for me to identify with one of those sects.
The essence of Jadidism is to study new things and incorporate them into our way of life, I can choose to study a specific field.
There are many factions within the United Synagogue, it is time for me to choose one to align myself with.
There are many sects within the Federation of Synagogues, it is time for me to choose one to join.

column3: Se rapprocher des religions orientales
column4: Östlicher Religion näher kommen
column6: Sincretizar con religiones orientales

column2: The [Root.Religion.GetName] faith has adopted many aspects of the Buddhist religion. You can choose to draw even closer to your §YBuddhist§! subjects by personally practicing their rites and partaking in their rituals.
column3: La foi [Root.Religion.GetName] a pris de nombreux aspects du bouddhisme. Vous pouvez choisir de vous rapprocher encore plus de vos sujets orientaux en adoptant leurs rites.
column4: Der [Root.Religion.GetName]-Glaube hat viele Aspekte der buddhistischen Religion angenommen. Ihr könnt wählen, Euch noch weiter Euren §Yöstlichen§! Untertanen anzunähern, indem Ihr selbst die Riten praktiziert und an ihren Ritualen teilnehmt.
column6: La fe [Root.Religion.GetName] ha adoptado muchos aspectos de la religión budista. Puedes elegir acercarte aún más a tus súbditos §Yorientales§! practicando personalmente sus ritos y tomando parte en sus rituales.

column2: Has a §YCounty§!, §YVassal§! or §YLiege§! of a §YBuddhist Religion§!
column3: A un comté, un vassal ou un seigneur lige d'une religion orientale
column4: Hat eine §YGrafschaft§!, einen §!Vasallen§! oder einen §YLehnsherrn§! der §Yöstlichen Glaubensgruppe§!
column6: Tiene un §Ycondado§!, §Yvasallo§! o §Yseñor§! de §Yreligión oriental§!

column3: Renaissance romaine
column4: Römische Renaissance
column6: Renacimiento romano

column2: With the Empire restored, we can all once again enjoy the civilized and opulent lifestyle of our ancestors.
column3: Avec la restauration de l'Empire, nous pouvons de nouveau profiter du mode de vie civilisé et opulent de nos ancêtres.
column4: Mit der Wiederherstellung des Reiches können wir alle wieder den zivilisierten und opulenten Lebensstil unserer Vorfahren genießen.
column6: Con el Imperio restaurado, todos podemos disfrutar de nuevo del estilo de vida civilizado y opulento de nuestros antepasados.

column2: §YHan Culture§! will start spreading across the Empire.
column3: La §Yculture romaine§! se répand dans l'Empire.
column4: Die §YRömische Kultur§! verbreitet sich im Reich.
column6: La §Ycultura romana§! empezará a extenderse por todo el Imperio.

column3: Adopter la culture romaine
column4: Römische Kultur annehmen
column6: Adoptar la cultura romana
